channel.title: About SCAR Tutorials
channel.description:
This is a forum where the best tutorials which members write will be stored. Regular members cannot post in this section, so Mods will have to move good tutorials here.
Good tutorials include:
[ul][*] Very detailed info about how to do EVERYTHING they are talking about. [*] A few pictures to clarify what you are saying because everyone knows "They are worth a 1000 words!" [*] It has to be completely 'Noob' proof, so someone who doesn't have a clue about the subject, can follow it easily without having to ask.[/ul]
Please don't ask for tuts to be moved here, Mods will move the ones they see fit into here
And please don't keep making loads and loads of tuts which are really short and don't really help. It is better to make a longer detailed tut rather than a short quick one, because these are the ones which will help people, meaning you wont be wasting your time.
Thanks a lot, Starblaster100

item.title: About SCAR Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

boykha2:

can someone tell me how to play this game!?!!

sorry for the off-topicness star, but this must be said. get away from these forums boykha. because you said that, there are only two things you can be: either a complete idiot or a person with a horrible sense of humor.

[quote=“WhoCares357, post:11, topic:793”]Where would you post your tutorials then?[/quote] the answer is right here:

Starblaster100:

In any SCAR Section, preferably Script Help or Scripting Help

Read full topic

item.title: About SCAR Tutorials
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

This is a verry good idea, because as u can see most of the time some tutorials are very dificult for noobs and very short so it kindda becomes a topic for spam.This will be a good place to put noob friendly tutorials so it will not become a topic for spam.

Great idea starblaster100 and whoever thought of it.

Glad To Help!
Good Luck!

@eagertolearn: [quote=“Starblaster100, post:4, topic:793”]In any SCAR Section, preferably Script Help or Scripting Help[/quote]
Glad To Help!
Good Luck!

Read full topic
